data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: A ring of suitable size is attached, and has on it a unique number, plus a contact address. The ____ is ____ weighed ____ measured, and ____ for ____ ( ____ may ____ be ____ ) ____ release. The ____ are ____ light-weight, and ____ no ____ effect ____ the ____. The individual birds can then be identified when they are re-trapped, or found dead.
data.partBlankContent: A ring of suitable size is attached, and has on it a unique number, plus a contact address. The bi__ is of___ weighed a__ measured, and exam____ for para_____ ( wh___ may th__ be rem____ ) bef___ release. The ri___ are ve__ light-weight, and ha__ no adv____ effect o_ the bi___. The individual birds can then be identified when they are re-trapped, or found dead.
data.fullContent: A ring of suitable size is attached, and has on it a unique number, plus a contact address. The bird is often weighed and measured, and examined for parasites ( which may then be removed ) before release. The rings are very light-weight, and have no adverse effect on the birds. The individual birds can then be identified when they are re-trapped, or found dead.
data.answer: 一个合适大小的环，上面有一个唯一的号码和一个联系地址。在释放之前，这些鸟通常要称重和测量，检查是否有寄生虫(寄生虫接着可能会被清除)。这些环非常轻，对鸟类没有不良影响。当它们被重新困住或被发现死亡时，它们的个体就可以被识别出来。
